PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To play this software on your PLAYSTATION®3 system, you must have at least 207MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system hard disk.
To play this software on your PSP®, you must install the latest system software version and have a Memory Stick Duo™ with the free space stated above.
For more detailed information about downloading to your PSP® system, please see URL below.

http://asia.playstation.com

When downloading using PC:
When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.
??

?Game description
High school students, Misuzu and Shogo, who have been friends from early in their childhood, starts a part-time job at a game company. After awfully busy days, the game development is completed and the title that was produced was a game which the company president also had confidence. But a very unfavorable assessment comes from a game magazine publisher that reviews the game. Almost at the same time, the company president disappears. Then he meets a mysterious death. While passing each day with an indescribable sense of unease, Misuzu receives a phone call from the deceased. In an unconventional adventure in the manner of PlayStation® software "YAKU" a world with new fears is brought forth.


?PS3™ HDD and Memory Stick Duo™ capacity requirement
207MB
